alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Susquehanna, northeastern Lackawanna and northwestern Wayne Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Forest City, or near Carbondale, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clifford, Forest City, Vandling, Union Dale, Royal, Pleasant Mount, Browndale, Elkdale, Richmondale and Uniondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
